sources.title: Caltiki, the Immortal Monster 1959 colorized
sources.description: A team of archaeologists in Mexico encounter an amorphous, blob-like monster that appears to be connected with the collapse of the Mayan civilization and a mysterious comet. Originally in Italian. I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
